description:
It's got everything you would expect from a modern, multi-platform port.
Hands-down the best way to replay this classic. Kyle Katarn aproved.
Works easily with the Steam version, just point it at the Steam install and go! I never imagined it'd be so easy to play.

So, Im pretty experienced, and tired a few tricks. this simply does not work on SteamOS on Steam Deck.

1. Tried to copy Resources and Episodes dir to the location specified in error. Nope.
2. Renamed fropm Episodes and Resopurces ot lower case name. Nope.
3. Tried with original Steam game installed on SD card as well as internal SSD. Nope.
4. Opened up permissions for the flatpak and added the asset directory. Nope.
5. Tried copying the entire game dir. Nope.

Regardless of trying all of these things, OpenJKDF2 will ask to instal from source media and completely fail and close. How tested was this packaged flatpak?
summary: Does not work on Steam Deck - fails to locate assets
